mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_dictionary (id, code, codeflag, codeflagname) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeflagname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select id, code, codeflag, codeflagname from sys_dictionary where 1=1
and code=#{code}
